title: Very high ping after patch 6.9...
body: Before this patch, I had ping in the range 30-60. Now, I have ping in the range 100-180, and sometimes even goes over 200. I don't know what happened, but my FPS seems to be fine. Any ways this problem can be resolved?

replies.body:
While we have announced Patch 6.9, it hasn't been released yet.  Therefore it seems the problem is completely unrelated to the patch.  To dig a little further into this, does it ever spike really high at all?  Or does it consistently stay at a very high ping?  Depending on which it is, it may point to a different root cause.

Reply back and let me know!
I'm definitely playing patch 6.9  >_> .. pretty sure it's been released.
When exactly did you patch?

> [{quoted}](name=KingMetalink,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AmUwvaN2,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-05-04T04:43:33.662+0000)
>
> When exactly did you patch?

Fongletto is playing on Oceania, so the patch rolled out today for him.
That's what I was thinking.
yeah veigars so op, holy this patch is op

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AmUwvaN2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T23:58:40.720+0000)
>
> While we have announced Patch 6.9, it hasn't been released yet.  Therefore it seems the problem is completely unrelated to the patch.  To dig a little further into this, does it ever spike really high at all?  Or does it consistently stay at a very high ping?  Depending on which it is, it may point to a different root cause.
> 
> Reply back and let me know!

Hi I thought I would add a reply directly to you since you were asking the questions.

For me this issue started last patch where it occurred only sometimes.  My ping jumps to 300+ (if I'm in loading screen for example I can watch it jump from green to 300+ numbers while its loading and this lag continues into the game).  As of downloading the most recent patch this morning I tried playing two games this afternoon and now that kind of lag is the happening the entire game.

I doubt it's a connection issue on my end.  I've been playing league for over a year now.  I had a really good connection before the server move, and it's still pretty good, but I've never had this kind of lag before barring the "reconnecting" error from a few patches ago that seems to have been fixed at this point.

Is anyone looking into this?  The game is currently unplayable for me.
Same here. Getting between 250-450ms consistently :(

this has happened to me too, even though 6.9 isn't released yet, after the announcement on the patcher my ping has been skyrocketing in game. It goes to 4k, 7k, one time even 11k. Then it stays there for a while and i just keep waiting for minutes and minutes, if i'm lucky it suddenly starts dropping by the 1000's then the 100s to my regular 79 ping, then it will just spike again. VERY annoying, please help me out here dartagnan, i spend more time waiting for my ping to normalize than actually playing the game. pls help me <3

> [{quoted}](name=Do It For NA ,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AmUwvaN2,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-05-04T04:55:51.840+0000)
>
> this has happened to me too, even though 6.9 isn't released yet, after the announcement on the patcher my ping has been skyrocketing in game. It goes to 4k, 7k, one time even 11k. Then it stays there for a while and i just keep waiting for minutes and minutes, if i'm lucky it suddenly starts dropping by the 1000's then the 100s to my regular 79 ping, then it will just spike again. VERY annoying, please help me out here dartagnan, i spend more time waiting for my ping to normalize than actually playing the game. pls help me <3

Can you give the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article a shot and see if that helps things out? If the problems continue, we can try to troubleshoot with you further.
ok ill do that thanks

I've spiked to over 5k, it's every game, I can play up until maybe 3 minutes then spikes over 200, once it gets over 300 I may as well just leave game because I'll be constantly typing /unpause trying to get the server to respond.

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AmUwvaN2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T23:58:40.720+0000)
>
> While we have announced Patch 6.9, it hasn't been released yet.  Therefore it seems the problem is completely unrelated to the patch.  To dig a little further into this, does it ever spike really high at all?  Or does it consistently stay at a very high ping?  Depending on which it is, it may point to a different root cause.
> 
> Reply back and let me know!

Despite OP's problem being fixed by the patch, I can certainly relate to his original problem.  I noticed my ping rise from a consistent ~42ms to a consistent ~88ms after the login issue presented itself at the end of last week.  Still having the same issue as of right now.  It's playable, but certainly something I'd want to fix if at all possible.  I've contacted my ISP and they've had no change in service status (which I kind of figured they would say anyway, since I have no real way of proving that statement) so I figured I would reach out to see if the issue is possibly not on my end.

Really appreciate any guidance you could give! Thanks in advance!

Hey, actually I didn't know that patch 6.9 was today. After this patch today, my ping returned to normal!! Now it's back to 30-40. I'll respond more if my my ping spikes up again, which I don't think will be the case.
Awesome to hear that it went back to normal!  If you experience any further issues, don't hesitate to create another thread!  ^.^
me to i have ping around 200-500 befor new patcj was 50 max now that game is unplayable riot help us

This patch has seen me spiking constantly to upwards of 600 ms from 17. The extremely frustrating part is that even spikes of 2-10 ms causes the game to lag as if you have 600 ping, which makes no sense. Small fluctuations are normal in online games, but in League the small spikes from 17 ms to 19/24 ms makes the game unplayable. 

This has happened since the servers were moved to Illinois but this patch has made the problem consistent. Other friends I play with experience this same issue almost exactly when I do. We live in the same state but have different ISPs, other games do not have this lag and none of us have packet loss when this occurs.

I'm having 300+ ping spikes that started occurring last patch.  It wasn't as bad though during that time, only every once and a while.  Tried playing two games today and it was 300 or more all the time.  Couldn't play at all.
i am also having terrible ping now that 6.9 is released. my internet is the same. fps has been dropping. similar to what happened last patch.
I actually have the same problem since the new patch

Oh my sweet summer child, you think 100-180 is bad. 
Mines been spiking from 30- 5k for the last year and a half. Impossible to climb ranked when everybody feeds and youre not even allowed to play the game. 
Evenot then I end up going even or have a positive kd when I constantly DC in lane and even at spawn. I've dc'd in the load screen before. Yesterday I played an aram, I played maybe 5 minutes of a 40 minute game playing a champ I never play I still managed to have a positive kd. 

Some dragon bullshit, and they're more interested in pro players not having a .000009 second delay.

I also have the same problem. When I'm in the game I normally have 17 ping, and it stays there. now I have minimum of 47 and goes up to like 926. I can't play like this. While my friend has no trouble at all and has 6 ping standard. My brother too has no problems at all. When I pingtest my IP it says i have a maximum of 10 ms. I can use YouTube, Twitch, 9GAG and all other things with no problem. But when I play League I lag as hell. 
I tried to flush my DNS and it did jackshit. It got back to 30 ping for like 5 minutes, then it went up to 200+ again. the game is unplayable and I can't move around normally.
Can someone tell me what my problem is?

This also started happening recently for me. It doesn't happen every game but more like every other. One game I have 35ping all of a sudden the next it's 230 or something.  I checked my connection while playing on speedtest.net and it's all gravy 50mb download, and 10 mb upload, so it's definitely not on my side. What's going on? It ruins promos big time.

I am having the same problem.
After this patch, my latency is way higher than it was before.
Any updates on this? I am still having a higher than normal latency.

Same!!! before 6.9, i got 48-120, usually about 74 and now im getting up to 2000+!!!!!!! wtf!??!?!
but the weird part is, when i lagged in the past it was almost all upload speed lag, with very little jitter, where it constantly stayed at about 620 ping, but here its jumping in huge spikes, constantly going from 80 all the way to 2900 in seconds!!!!! and it seems that it only spike whenever i cast a spell near another champion.... hmm... it may be my firewall thinking that the game connection is a low priority/background network, and is trying to slow it down to make way for i dont know, things like my internet explorer, cookie clearing, that dumb stuff.

I just played a ranked game with one of my friends and held a consistent 82-83 ping. It did not feel like it at all and because of it, sometimes I even felt like the number (ms) was frozen at 82 or 83. It felt like 200+ at times and I asked my friend if he felt slower or was lagging and he told me he was along with asking the enemy team. There were multiple times throughout the game where either I clicked to auto and then clicked to run immediately after to have my champion keep running to auto still or where my friend had dove a turret to clean up an easy kill but couldn't because he spiked underneath the tower and couldn't move or anything. I believe this is due to packet loss because as the user, if your ping doesn't change but you're lagging which means it is a server side problem and not a problem with your home internet connection. I also started to notice a few things weird with lag but were very subtle and didn't really have an impact on a game starting around Patch 6.6 unlike the problems I noticed after patch 6.9.
Same here. Disconnection from games loading and constant reconnecting in-game.
Same here help 2 hours same deal every game
